item.description:
On Saturday October 13th from 1:30 PM - 5:30 PM, the Massachusetts College Republicans are holding their Fall Convention at Tufts University. We will have a Ron Paul table located in the lobby (that everyone must walk through).

This is an event we need to be at to show that Ron Paul has real support from within the Republican party. It is also important because it targets the young demographic, one that is very important to Dr. Paul's campaign as we are all well aware of.

More information on this convention here:

http://www.macr.org/j...

Also, this is one of the files on our list. We should try to print this and distribute it at this event:
http://files.meetup.c...
item.name: MA College Republicans Fall Convention
